answers.answer: "what is causing this and how can i treat it?"This is something that has to be closely examined by a doctor. If your diabetes has been left uncontrolled and unmanaged for a long period of time you may be experiencing nerve problems. Also could be associated with menopause, lack of vitamins, circulation problems, or shingles. If from diabetes better control of your glucose is needed. See your doctor as medicinal creams/ointments are available. Good luck

title: skin burning sensation
